catalog_script_client.name: CargarEliminarMonitorSaludBCR

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_ea7a288f4f563300c09fb8de9310c747
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:c591d0874f163300c09fb8de9310c70d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CargarEliminarMonitorSaludBCR</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var instanciaBCR = g_form.getValue('instancia_primaria_bcr');
	var tipoSolicitud = g_form.getValue('tipo_de_solicitud');
	//var virtualServer = g_form.getValue('');
	
	if(tipoSolicitud == 'Eliminar Monitores de Salud'){
		
		if(instanciaBCR == '172.21.72.30'){
			//mando a llamar el glide de Virtual server a mostrar
			
			//aqui va el cargar grups
		var gaa = new GlideAjax('MostrarMonitorSaludBCR30');
		gaa.addParam('sysparm_name', 'listaMonitor');
		gaa.getXML(BCRParse30);	
			
		}else if(instanciaBCR == '172.21.72.32'){
			
			//mando a llamar el glide de Virtual server a mostrar
			
				//aqui va el cargar grups
		var ga = new GlideAjax('MosrarMonitorSalud32');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'listarMonitorSalud');
		ga.getXML(BCRParse32);		
			
		}//fin IF
		
	}// fin IF solicitud
	
	
		//funciones--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	function BCRParse30 (response) {
		var reponseScriptData = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		var arrayValue = JSON.parse(reponseScriptData).lbmonitor;
		for(var i = 0; i < arrayValue.length; i++ ){
			var dataBoxFill = arrayValue[i].monitorname;
			g_form.addOption('monitor_de_salud_a_eliminar',dataBoxFill,dataBoxFill);
		}//fin for
	}
	
	
	function BCRParse32 (response) {
		var reponseScriptData = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		var arrayValue = JSON.parse(reponseScriptData).lbmonitor;
		for(var i = 0; i < arrayValue.length; i++ ){
			var dataBoxFill = arrayValue[i].monitorname;
			g_form.addOption('monitor_de_salud_a_eliminar',dataBoxFill,dataBoxFill);
		}//fin for
	}
   
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-01 22:15:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ea7a288f4f563300c09fb8de9310c747</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CargarEliminarMonitorSaludBCR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ea7a288f4f563300c09fb8de9310c747</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>701980296</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-10 15:22:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
